name: Scalene's Quest
description:
Hallo!

This is my second game.

It was made in two days for Gutter Jam 3.

The Jam Theme was "Shapes". So I decided to make a short game about a scalene triangle warrior who needs to defeat an evil entity and its army.

I hope you enjoy it.

Controls:
Z - Shield (Defense) (Shield icon will appear when needed.)
X - Sword (Attack) and menu interactions.

Attack and defense actions consume stamina.
Defending without enemy attacks will also consume your stamina. Don't waste it.
